pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modeling Over Dispersed Binomial Outcome Data Using BMD and ABD // Contains Probability Mass Functions, Cumulative Mass Functions, Negative Log Likelihood value, parameter estimation and modeling data using Binomial Mixture Distributions (BMD) (Manoj et al (2013) doi:10.5539/ijsp.v2n2p24) and Alternate Binomial Distributions (ABD) (Paul (1985) doi:10.1080/03610928508828990).
